snippet: Phil Mickelson surged up the leader board with a nine-under-par 63 to put himself in second place after the third round of the Abu Dhabi HSBC Golf Championship.
abstract: Craig Lee takes third-round lead at Abu Dhabi Golf Championship, with Phil Mickelson in second place; other golf news noted.
lead_paragraph: Phil Mickelson surged up the leader board with a nine-under-par 63 to put himself in second place after the third round of the Abu Dhabi HSBC Golf Championship.

headline.main: Mickelson Shines in Abu Dhabi; McIlroy Accepts Penalty on a ‘Stupid’ Rule
